Most addictive truck driving game of 2017:

3d Army Truck Driving Simulator is an exciting with realistic and one of the most addictive army truck racing game of 2017. The most thrilling army shooting, driving and training game ever made. Drive your army truck on to the dangerous hilly roads and deadly impossible ways in epic war zone place.
Top 3d Military Truck Driver is a challenging and adventuress missile launcher game. This truck driving game test your patience, parking and driving skills along with shooting experience in a battlefield. Drive through some challenging and difficult levels under extreme difficult weather conditions. This epic army missions mania truck driving game is most realistic missile launcher simulation war game. It is based on real army tactics and top secret missions. Be the most effective army driver. Battle each challenge you faced within the line of duty. Be an especially skilled driver for your soldiers in arms and win the war. Activate the ignition of army truck and complete your war trip during this different test run. It is completely different to drive in a military base then driving within the town or city.

Different Military Truck Parking Missions:

These parking missions are not simply a part of game however to coach you for driving trucks and army vehicles in warzone. On the fight grounds the troopers wants their provides thus that is why the military desires a most skillful driver such as you to finish such epic dangerous job. Each level of Offroad Military Truck Driving is more thrilling than the previous level. Drive carefully through the dark night, scary foggy weather and in thundering heavy rain. Show your parking and drifting skills as the best heavy duty military truck driver. Come and play the most exciting and top 3d Military truck driving game ever.


Use Army rocket launcher:
In 3d Army Truck Driving Simulator you will feel like a real missile launcher truck driver in pak army. Militants and terrorists are hiding so you will use US ballistic combat truck and deadly bombs to attack them. Destroy the terrorists check posts. Attacking must be silent like limbo but still most effective and destructive. Experience the exciting and thrilling action. Be the experienced and truly army truck driver. Drive like a real army soldier from one army base to another. Transport military commando soldiers and army officers to their destination. Complete Military truck driver tasks and duties often. Do it in time and don't hit the powerful military truck. Try the power of a big military truck with rocket launchers that produce the real thing. Be fast and experienced driver other bravo soldiers are waiting for your cargo truck. Use an US army navigation map to find a military base.

Dodged incoming missiles and rocket launcher attacks:
Drive pak army truck on asphalt road. Dodge incoming missiles attacks that feel a close to the real war. Drive missile launcher at the front lines and take out the enemy base with your extreme launcher attack. Army trucks are outstanding and you will have ability to do things very well real physics. Military life is amazing and exciting. Driving an armed truck or military cargos on offroad and war zone is even epic and stunning. Bumpy and curvy roads challenge you to form it to the destination or targeted point. Tanks and f16 juts around to be taken care of you and transfer some army stuff like military jeeps.

Key Features of Top 3d Military Truck Driver:

- Amazing 3D Graphics & Off Road Environment
- Dangerous mountain-filled roads
- Realistic truck handling
- Realistic game sounds
- Easy to learn, handle and drive.
- Harmful missile and bomb to ruin rivals completely.
- Fun to play game with addictive and attractive game play.
- Real 3D animated soldiers with guns.
- Multiple army shooting and truck driving levels in war zone.
